formatting:
{first} > first_name
{last} > last_name
{fullname} > full_name
{username} > username
{mention} > mention_html
{chat_id} > chat.id
{user_id} > user.id
{chatname} > chat_title

callback_messages.text_formats:
Formatting
{first}: The user's firstname : The user's lastname : The user's fullname {username}: The user's username : To mention the user {id}: The user's ID {chatname}: Chat title Example: Hi {mention}, welcome to {chatname}
callback_messages.group_management: Group Moderation Commands - /id » Show chat/user id /invite » Generate/Get invite link /promote » Promote a member /demote » Demote a member /pin » Pin message loudly /unpin » Unpin a pinned message or all pinned messages /ban » Ban a member /unban » Unban a member /kick » Kick a member /kickme » The easy way to out /mute » Mute a member (member will be unable to send messages etc.) /unmute » Unmute a member (member will be able to send messages etc.) /del » Delete replied message with notifying/telling something to the member! /purge » Delete every messages from replied message to current message! /lock » Lock the chat (no one can send messages etc.) /unlock » Unlock the chat (back to normal) /filters | /filter | /remove » To see/set/remove custom message/command /adminlist » See chat admins list /settings » Settings of chat (welcome, antibot, translate etc.) Note: Type commands to get more details about the command function!
callback_messages.ai: Artificial intelligence functions - /imagine » Generate AI image /gpt » Ask any question to ChatGPT Note: Type commands to get more details about the command function!
callback_messages.misc_func: Misc functions - /movie » Get any movie info by name/imdb_id /tr » Translate any language /decode » Decode - base64 to text /encode » Encode - text to base64 /short » Short any url /ping » Ping any url /calc » Calculate any math (supported syntex: +, -, *, /) /webshot » Take Screenshot of any website /weather » Get weather info of any city /ytdl » Download youtube video /yts » Search video on youtube /qr » To generate a QR code /itl » To convert image into link /id » Show chat/user id /settings » Settings of chat Note: Type commands to get more details about the command function!
callback_messages.owner_func: Bot owner functions - /broadcast » Broadcast message to bot users /db » Get bot database /bsettings » Get bot settings /shell » Use system shell /log » Get log file (for error handling) /restart » Restart the bot /sys » Get system info Note: Type commands to get more details about the command function!
callback_messages.help_menu:
Hi {user.mention_html()}! Welcome to the bot help section...
I'm a comprehensive Telegram bot designed to manage groups and perform various functions...

/start - to start the bot
/help - to see this message

T.users: {total_users} | A.users: {active_users} | Inactive: {inactive_users}
callback_messages.bot_pic: Bot Settings Bot pic: {bot_pic} Note: Send an image url/link to set bot pic!
callback_messages.welcome_img: Bot Settings Welcome img: {welcome_img} Note: Should bot show bot_pic on start?
callback_messages.images: Bot Settings images: {images} Note: Single image or Upload multiple image link separated by comma!
callback_messages.server_url: Bot Settings Server url: {server_url} Note: Bot will fall asleep if you deployed the bot on render (free) and don't set this value...
callback_messages.sudo_users: Bot Settings Sudo users: {sudo_users} Note: The power user! Sudo users have owner function access! Add user_id eg. 2134776547
callback_messages.shrinkme_api: Bot Settings Shrinkme API: {shrinkme_api} Note: This api for /short command!
callback_messages.omdb_api: Bot Settings OMDB API: {omdb_api} Note: This api for /movie command!
callback_messages.weather_api: Bot Settings Weather API: {weather_api} Note: This api for /weather command!
callback_messages.restore_db: Bot Settings Which data will be deleted? ⚠ - All bot setting Which data won't be deleted? - Bot users/groups data Note: This will erase all bot data/settings from database and restore data/settings from config.env
callback_messages.lang: Chat Settings Language code: {lang} Note: Get your country language code from the below link! eg. English language code is en
callback_messages.auto_tr: Chat Settings Auto translate: {auto_tr} Note: This will automatically translate chat conversation into chat default language!
callback_messages.set_echo: Chat Settings Echo: {echo} Note: This will repeat user message!
callback_messages.welcome_msg: Chat Settings Welcome user: {welcome_msg} Note: This will welcome the new chat member!
callback_messages.set_custom_msg: Chat Settings Welcome message -------------------- {custom_welcome_msg} Note: This message will be send as greeting message in the chat when a user join!
callback_messages.goodbye_msg: Chat Settings Goodbye user: {goodbye_msg} Note: This will send a farewell message to chat when a user left!
callback_messages.antibot: Chat Settings Antibot: {antibot} Note: This will prevent other bot from joining in chat!
callback_messages.del_cmd: Chat Settings Delete cmd: {del_cmd} Note: This will delete bot commands when you will send a command in chat!
callback_messages.log_channel: Chat Settings Log channel: {log_channel} Note: This will log every actions occurred in your chat (ban, kick, mute, etc.) using bot! Add the bot in a channel as admin where you want to log, then you will get a message with chat_id from bot, pass the chat_id using edit value!
callback_messages.links_behave: Chat Settings All links: {all_links} Allowed links: {allowed_links} Note: Select whether it will delete or convert the links into base64 or do nothing if links in message! Allowed links » these links won't be deleted! Delete links » replace the links with `forbidden link` Echo/Auto translate won't work if message contains link!
callback_messages.all_links: Chat Settings All links: {all_links} Note: Select whether bot will delete the message or convert link into base64 or do nothing!
callback_messages.allowed_links: Chat Settings Allowed links: {allowed_links} Note: Send domain name of allowed links eg. google.com multiple domain will be separated by comma!
callback_messages.ai_status: Chat Settings AI status: {ai_status} Note: Enable / Disbale AI functions in chat!
callback_messages.c_setting_menu: Chat Settings • Title: {title} • ID: {chat.id} • Lang: {lang} • Echo: {echo} • Auto tr: {auto_tr} • Welcome user: {welcome_msg} • Goodbye user: {goodbye_msg} • Antibot: {antibot} • AI status: {ai_status} • Delete cmd: {del_cmd} • All links: {all_links} • Allowed links: {allowed_links} • Log channel: {log_channel}
callback_messages.db_user_data: Chat Settings • User: {user_mention} • ID: {user.id} • Lang: {lang} • Echo: {echo} • Auto tr: {auto_tr}
